includedAssets.title: Cocoon   (1985)
includedAssets.synopsis: Guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face, Ron Howard's sci-fi fantasy sees a bunch of curmudgeonly old folks undergo a miraculous rejuvenation when they come into contact with beings from another planet. Veterans Don Ameche, Hume Cronyn, Wilford Brimley and Jessica Tandy show 'young' upstarts like Steve Guttenberg, Brian Dennehy and Tahnee 'daughter of Raquel' Welch how it's done. Perfect entertainment for ages 6 to 106.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A group of senior citizens experience rejuvenating effects created by alien pods in this enchanting fantasy from director Ron Howard.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face, Ron Howard's sci-fi fantasy sees a bunch of curmudgeonly old folks undergo a miraculous rejuvenation when they come into contact with beings from another planet. Veterans Don Ameche, Hume Cronyn, Wilford Brimley and Jessica Tandy show 'young' upstarts like Steve Guttenberg, Brian Dennehy and Tahnee 'daughter of Raquel' Welch how it's done. Perfect entertainment for ages 6 to 106.

includedAssets.title: Cocoon: The Return
includedAssets.synopsis: All the old cast is back for the sequel to Ron Howard's sci-fantasy Cocoon which sees the twinkly old timers - previously rejuvenated by alien contact - return to Earth to visit their loved ones. Poignant and very human portrayals - particularly from Hume Cronyn and his now-hospitalised wife Jessica Tandy (they were married in real life) - make this second trip hugely worthwhile.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sci-fi sequel in which a group of senior citizens who left Earth for the planet of eternal youth visit home. Stars Steve Guttenberg and Courteney Cox.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: All the old cast is back for the sequel to Ron Howard's sci-fantasy Cocoon which sees the twinkly old timers - previously rejuvenated by alien contact - return to Earth to visit their loved ones. Poignant and very human portrayals - particularly from Hume Cronyn and his now-hospitalised wife Jessica Tandy (they were married in real life) - make this second trip hugely worthwhile.

includedAssets.title: Cocoon Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: An elderly group are mysteriously rejuvenated by a pool containing alien cocoons, then must decide if they wish to remain eternally young. Ron Howard's smash-hit fantasy and its sequel starring Courteney Cox.
